def is_soap_nearby(sink:item):
    # Function to check if there is soap near the sink
    symbol nearby_soap = exists soap: item : is_soap(soap) and close(soap, sink)
    return nearby_soap

behavior grab_and_add_soap(soap:item, sink:item):
    body:
        grab(soap) # Grab the soap
        put_inside(soap, sink) # Add the soap to the sink with water

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and id[sink]==42
        # Select sink with ID 42

                is_soap(soap) and close(soap, sink)
            grab_and_add_soap(soap, sink)
        else:
            foreach soap: item:
                if is_soap(soap) and not visited(soap):
                    observe(soap, "Check the location of the soap")
